languages.text: {n}Голос хормейстера звучит внутри вашего разума.{/n} "Я... не вижу их. Не могу читать их мысли. Не могу прозреть их логово. Мне являются лишь образы, обрывочные и жуткие. Простите, Лорд-капитан, но мы рискнули напрасно".

{n}The Choirmaster's voice sounds inside your mind.{/n} "I... cannot see them. I cannot read their minds. I cannot see into their lair. I see only images, fragmented and sinister. Forgive me, Lord Captain, but we took this risk in vain."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос хормейстера звучит внутри вашего разума.{/n} "Я... не вижу их. Не могу читать их мысли. Не могу прозреть их логово. Мне являются лишь образы, обрывочные и жуткие. Простите, Лорд-капитан, но мы рискнули напрасно".

{n}The Choirmaster's voice sounds inside your mind.{/n} "I... cannot see them. I cannot read their minds. I cannot see into their lair. I see only images, fragmented and sinister. Forgive me, Lord Captain, but we took this risk in vain."

{n}The Choirmaster's voice sounds inside your mind.{/n} "I... cannot see them. I cannot read their minds. I cannot see into their lair. I see only images, fragmented and sinister. Forgive me, Lord Captain, but we took this risk in vain."

{n}The Choirmaster's voice sounds inside your mind.{/n} "I... cannot see them. I cannot read their minds. I cannot see into their lair. I see only images, fragmented and sinister. Forgive me, Lord Captain, but we took this risk in vain."

languages.text: {n}Las palabras del Maestro del Coro resuenan en tu cabeza.{/n} «No... puedo verles. No puedo leerles la mente. No puedo adentrarme en su cubil. Solo veo imágenes, fragmentadas y siniestras. Perdóneme, Lord Capitán, pero hemos corrido este riesgo en vano».
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's voice sounds inside your mind.{/n} "I... cannot see them. I cannot read their minds. I cannot see into their lair. I see only images, fragmented and sinister. Forgive me, Lord Captain, but we took this risk in vain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las palabras del Maestro del Coro resuenan en tu cabeza.{/n} «No... puedo verles. No puedo leerles la mente. No puedo adentrarme en su cubil. Solo veo imágenes, fragmentadas y siniestras. Perdóneme, Lord Capitán, pero hemos corrido este riesgo en vano».

languages.text: {n}クワイアーマスターの声が心の中で響く。{/n}「私には…見えません。彼らの心を読むことができないのです。隠れ家も見えない。見えるのは不吉なイメージの断片だけです。お許しください、ロード・キャプテン…しかし、我々の冒した危険は無駄でした」
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's voice sounds inside your mind.{/n} "I... cannot see them. I cannot read their minds. I cannot see into their lair. I see only images, fragmented and sinister. Forgive me, Lord Captain, but we took this risk in vain."

traits.locale_text: {n}クワイアーマスターの声が心の中で響く。{/n}「私には…見えません。彼らの心を読むことができないのです。隠れ家も見えない。見えるのは不吉なイメージの断片だけです。お許しください、ロード・キャプテン…しかし、我々の冒した危険は無駄でした」

languages.text: {n}唱诗大师的声音在你脑海中响起。{/n}“我……我看不到他们，理解不了他们的意识，也找不到他们的巢穴。我们只能看到支离破碎的邪恶画面。请原谅我，舰长大人，我们冒了这么大的风险，结果却徒劳无功。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's voice sounds inside your mind.{/n} "I... cannot see them. I cannot read their minds. I cannot see into their lair. I see only images, fragmented and sinister. Forgive me, Lord Captain, but we took this risk in vain."

traits.locale_text: {n}唱诗大师的声音在你脑海中响起。{/n}“我……我看不到他们，理解不了他们的意识，也找不到他们的巢穴。我们只能看到支离破碎的邪恶画面。请原谅我，舰长大人，我们冒了这么大的风险，结果却徒劳无功。”

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme des Chormeisters hallt in deinem Verstand wider.{/n} "Ich ... kann sie nicht sehen. Ich kann ihre Gedanken nicht lesen. Ich sehe nicht in ihr Versteck. Ich sehe nur Bilder, bruchstückhaft und unheilvoll. Vergebt mir, Lord Captain, aber wir sind dieses Risiko umsonst eingegangen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's voice sounds inside your mind.{/n} "I... cannot see them. I cannot read their minds. I cannot see into their lair. I see only images, fragmented and sinister. Forgive me, Lord Captain, but we took this risk in vain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme des Chormeisters hallt in deinem Verstand wider.{/n} "Ich ... kann sie nicht sehen. Ich kann ihre Gedanken nicht lesen. Ich sehe nicht in ihr Versteck. Ich sehe nur Bilder, bruchstückhaft und unheilvoll. Vergebt mir, Lord Captain, aber wir sind dieses Risiko umsonst eingegangen."

languages.text: {n}La voix du maître de chœur résonne dans votre esprit.{/n} « En ce qui me concerne, je ne le vois pas. Ses pensées me sont inaccessibles. Son antre se dérobe à mon regard. Je ne perçois guère que des images fragmentées et sinistres. Je regrette, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais nous avons risqué nos vies en pure perte. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's voice sounds inside your mind.{/n} "I... cannot see them. I cannot read their minds. I cannot see into their lair. I see only images, fragmented and sinister. Forgive me, Lord Captain, but we took this risk in vain."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix du maître de chœur résonne dans votre esprit.{/n} « En ce qui me concerne, je ne le vois pas. Ses pensées me sont inaccessibles. Son antre se dérobe à mon regard. Je ne perçois guère que des images fragmentées et sinistres. Je regrette, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais nous avons risqué nos vies en pure perte. »

languages.text: {n}Koro Şefi'nin sesi, zihninde yankılanıyor.{/n} "Ben... Onları göremiyorum. Zihinlerini okuyamıyorum. İnlerini göremiyorum. Yalnızca paramparça olmuş, uğursuz suretler görüyorum. Beni affedin Lord Kaptan ama bu riski beyhude yere aldık."
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's voice sounds inside your mind.{/n} "I... cannot see them. I cannot read their minds. I cannot see into their lair. I see only images, fragmented and sinister. Forgive me, Lord Captain, but we took this risk in vain."
